title: Inquiry Science-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course: Problem-Solving and Evidence Analysis Focus

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education experience, mobile device proficiency, fundamental statistical and graph interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Inquiry-based science principles applied to instructional design competency development for in-service K-12 math teachers. Mobile learning environments via digital devices; focus on data analysis, visual representation, and problem-solving processes.

learning_goals: Over 80% of participants achieve competency in designing math problem-solving lessons based on inquiry-based science education principles, as measured by assessment tools.
Learners can apply teacher language models for facilitating student-centered discussions and group activities to actual equation/graph analysis lesson designs.
Complete a project report (including statistical analysis) measuring the effectiveness of inquiry-based science math lessons using digital assessment tools.

resources: Inquiry-Based Science and Mathematics Lesson Videos

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
